segments.text: Hey , David . Would you like some drinks ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Shall we go to a bar ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good idea . I like hanging out in bars at night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For killing time and making new friends .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't you think it â€™ s too noisy here ? The rock music ! I can hardly bear it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Calm down ! My little guy ! You'll get used to that after you come here several times .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'll try . Then what would you like to drink ? It's on me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd like a gin and tonic .
segments.speaker: S1
